name: lect-25
description: what are middlewares   how to make a middleware   apply middleware on routes   types of middleware   interview question.   # middleware         ye function hota hai . jo ki routes ke sath use hota hai isse reequest aur response ko modify kar skte hai.         site block karna, age check karna , etc.         ek bar middleware bnte hai ise sabhi jagah use karte hai
